column3: Latest;Siem Reap: The Office of Investigation and Procedure at about 18:00 on May 9
column4: 2019 visited LOTUS WORLD in Chey Village
column8: inviting a foreigner in for questioning.------The foreigner
column11: arrived in the Kingdom of Cambodia on 30 January 2019
column12: at the Poipet international border and has no accommodation or money for food.------He has been surviving by asking for money from other Koreans staying in Siem Reap.------The Korean was previously deported from Cambodia in 2017
column13: but managed to sneak back in.------He was sent to the eviction center in Siem Reap to proceed with the legalities.------From General Department of Immigration------*So the report says
